name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No More Threads - Hide Twitter Threads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Tweet Threads on your Twitter Timeline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No More Threads creates a toggle at the top of your Twitter timeline to make it easy to hide and unhide threads. 

Enable the toggle and all tweet threads are hidden from your timeline. Turn off the toggle and you can see tweet threads again without losing your place while browsing Twitter.
